Package reso.examples.selectiveRepeat.logger

Class Logger

java.lang.Object
reso.examples.selectiveRepeat.logger.Logger
public class Logger extends Object
Utility class that logs data to the console, ask for user input and log data in files. Primary roles : - log data changes such as window size - log packet and ack sending, receiving and loss - ask for user input (link length, bitrate...) - log data in a .csv file

    • logLoss

      public static void logLoss​(int seqNumber, double newCwnd, double newSst)
      Log a timeout and show the new congestion window size and the new slow start threshold.
      Parameters:
      seqNumber - The sequence number of the timed out packet.
      newCwnd - The new size of the congestion window.
      newSst - The new slow start threshold.

    • logCongestionWindowSizeChanged

      public static void logCongestionWindowSizeChanged​(double oldCwnd, double newCwnd)
      Log a change in size of the congestion window and indicates whether we are in additive increase or slow start mode.
      Parameters:
      oldCwnd - The previous size of the congestion window.
      newCwnd - The new size of the congestion window.

    • packetReceived

      public static void packetReceived​(int data, reso.ip.IPAddress src, reso.ip.IPAddress dst, reso.common.Host host)
      Log a packet received by the receiver part of the Selective Repeat Protocol.
      Parameters:
      data - The data of the packet received by the app
      src - Who sent the packet
      dst - The receiver of the packet
      host - Host of the reception

    • saveWindowChanges

      public static void saveWindowChanges​(String windowHistory) throws Exception
      Register a size change of the congestion window in a .csv file for plotting.
      Parameters:
      windowHistory - The content to write to the .csv file.
      Throws:
      Exception - When an exception occurs because of the BufferedWriter.
